title: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM (excluding the areas under D P roads/ road setback) is less than the land component of built up amenity required as per this Regulation, only the additional land area shall be provided for amenity
clause_text: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM (excluding the areas under D P roads/ road setback) is less than the land component of built up amenity required as per this Regulation, only the additional land area shall be provided for amenity.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
